description: The Legion was in constant serce of better and more Mercenaries to fight in their armies. They could create and sign exclusive pacts between some of Hyrule most deadliest and famous warriors for hire.
tooltip: The Legion was in constant serce of better and more Mercenaries to fight in their armies. They could create and sign exclusive pacts between some of Hyrule most deadliest and famous warriors for hire. (Allows the training of two additional Mercenaries at Foreign Quarter)
